text: Until the coronavirus shut them down in March, Sec. Pompeo and his wife held elaborate, unpublicized gatherings known as "Madison Dinners" regularly in historic Diplomatic Reception Rooms on the government's dime. #NBCNewsThreads https://t.co/mStWKigmy8 (1/8)
